discourse_list.title: Request for Proposals: "Sign-In with Ethereum" Specification - please submit by 2021-07-30 at 5pm PST

content.content: The Ethereum Foundation (EF) and True Names LTD (ENS) would like to announce a Request for Proposals (RFP) for the creation of a Sign-In with Ethereum specification, a package using Oauth for easy implementation by web2 services, and a Javascript library for the user-facing part of sign-in. … Proposals must be submitted before July 30th, 2021 at 5pm PST  The RFP: Sign-in with Ethereum RFP - HackMD The Tweet:   twitter.com    Ethereum Name Service | ens.eth @ensdomains    Pleased to announce that ENS & the Ethereum Foundation (@ethereum) are co-sponsoring a grant and RFP to support standardizing Sign-in with Ethereum.  Please help spread the word to interested parties!  Summary in 🧵 below, full details in RFP: https://t.co/EC1PRAOi6Y  1/       brantly.eth @BrantlyMillegan  The Ethereum community has accidentally solved a major problem of the Internet: Single Sign-On  "Sign-In w/ Ethereum" is the future of login for *every app on the Internet*, crypto-related or not  Not just an idea, it's already the norm for web3 & will spread  warning long 1/ pic.twitter.com/e2zthse6jR    9:09 AM - 12 Jul 2021           549                175
